channel.title: [Showoff] Solaris, Blade of Divine Elements v2 [Showoff]
channel.description:
Well I got "writers block"...but for modelling..."Modeller's Block"? Anyways, I made this to try and get the ingenuity flowing. It is within the reach of RSPS poly limit, if i get good responses I will convert to .mqo and recolor and format, all that good stuff. Well ive talked enough, here it is [size=18pt]Solaris' Stats[/size] -Made in C4D -Intented to be two handed -Awesome -Triangulated it would have 1988 poly and 1139 vertices -Took me about two hours -34 objects ~~~~~~~~VERSION TWO PICTURE~~~~~~~~~ [URL=http://img704.imageshack.us/i/asolarisrevised.png/][IMG]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/6294/asolarisrevised.png[/img][/URL]
~~~~~~~~Version one pics~~~~~~~~~~~~ [URL=http://img94.imageshack.us/i/asolaris1.png/][IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/6848/asolaris1.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img697.imageshack.us/i/asolaris2.png/][IMG]http://img697.imageshack.us/img697/3639/asolaris2.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img176.imageshack.us/i/asolaris3.png/][IMG]http://img176.imageshack.us/img176/5376/asolaris3.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img534.imageshack.us/i/asolaris4.png/][IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/9919/asolaris4.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img443.imageshack.us/i/asolarisinfo.png/][IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/460/asolarisinfo.png[/img][/URL]
If you view this thread and pictures, please leave a comment. Rate out of 10 and tell me how I can improve! Thank you! :) EDIT: I geuss the pictures are hard to see due to their size, if you click them it will show you it in a smaller size on imageshack.

item.title: [Showoff] Solaris, Blade of Divine Elements v2 [Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Lol, well since you are all having modelers block ill finish these swords for college and post some pics, it might help everybody out. No guarantee though, but it will be worth a try.

@TOPIC - Eeh, you might want to start fixing the glows in some of that, i know its in the background but still. Also, the design of the sword isn’t too good, and lets face it, the colors are not a good choice either. Sorry if you think its harsh, but hey, we all have out own opinions right?

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Solaris, Blade of Divine Elements v2 [Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Well, ive only been doing C4D for a little while, once ive used it for a little longer, dont worry the models will get better. Like I said, I have modellers block and I didnt do too good on this one, cut me some slack

item.title: [Showoff] Solaris, Blade of Divine Elements v2 [Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Ugh, I’ve had total artists block for the past month too.

@topic: I like it, but it just seems a bit too pressed together to be all yellow. Make it less connected I guess, aside from that it’s awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Solaris, Blade of Divine Elements v2 [Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Well I got “writers block”…but for modelling…“Modeller’s Block”? Anyways, I made this to try and get the ingenuity flowing. It is within the reach of RSPS poly limit, if i get good responses I will convert to .mqo and recolor and format, all that good stuff. Well ive talked enough, here it is
[size=18pt]Solaris’ Stats[/size]
-Made in C4D
-Intented to be two handed
-Awesome
-Triangulated it would have 1988 poly and 1139 vertices
-Took me about two hours
-34 objects
VERSION TWO PICTURE~

Version one pics~~~~

If you view this thread and pictures, please leave a comment. Rate out of 10 and tell me how I can improve! Thank you!
EDIT: I geuss the pictures are hard to see due to their size, if you click them it will show you it in a smaller size on imageshack.
